price: Hili ni Onyo katika maonyo yale yale ya zamani.
footnotes: Hii Qur'ani ni onyo katika jinsi ya yale yale maonyo ya kale waliyo onywa kwayo watu walio tangulia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
